privacyPolicy.introduction: [Company Name] (“we”, “our”, or “us”) values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

Usage Information: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and interaction data.
Payment Information: Payment details collected through secure payment gateways (we do not store card information directly).

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To provide and improve our services.
To process payments and transactions.
To communicate updates, offers, or service-related notifications.
To comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Sharing Your Information

We may share your information with service providers assisting in operations.
We may share information as required by law or legal processes.

sections.title: Data Security
content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data.
However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: Your Rights
content: You may access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at [email/contact].

You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.
